name: Wednesday VR
description:
Hi everyone Im a big fan of the TV serie Wednesday and decided to make a fan game.

What you'll see in the 0.1 :

You are Wednesday in front of a mirror and you can move with the controllers or the hand tracking 2.0

What coming next :

Multiplayer

Story Mode

Dance mode

This project is free and will always be 100% free.

If you like my work and want support the game you can do a donation on itch.

For the preview/update on the project you can follow me on twitter : @afredenucci_

Hope you guys will like it !!
